name: Medieval Rows
description: This is a two-player strategy game inspired by the Warlords games that used to be on flash player. Each player picks from 4 different units and 5 different rows to send them on to have them make it to the other side and damage the opponent's health bar at the top of the screen. There is a soldiers page that lists the unit's stats. Arrow keys up and down to change rows for the player on the right and 'w' and 'a' for up and down for the player on the left. The buttons for sending units is shown by their icons at the top of the screen.
